CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( MONTH ( FieloEE__Birthdate__c ) > MONTH (TODAY()), AND( MONTH ( FieloEE__Birthdate__c ) = MONTH (TODAY()), DAY ( FieloEE__Birthdate__c ) >= DAY (TODAY()+1))), YEAR (TODAY()) - YEAR ( FieloEE__Birthdate__c ) -1, YEAR (TODAY()) - YEAR ( FieloEE__Birthdate__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the age of the member.
CustomField.label: Age
